message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $20000 for it, which reflects its value and quality. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and your interest in the product.  While I understand your perspective, $18000 is a bit lower than what I'm hoping for.  I'm willing to come down to $19000, which is a fair compromise considering the value and quality of this product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $19000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $18500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
